(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Unless 
          (Else 
            (Statement 
              (Arg 
                (Primary 
                  (Lhs 
                    (Variable 
                      (Identifier "bat"))))))) 
          (Then 
            (Statement 
              (Arg 
                (Primary 
                  (Lhs 
                    (Variable 
                      (Identifier "bar"))))))) 
          (Statement 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (Variable 
                    (Identifier "foo")))))))))))
